mapper.select: select 待审核ID as UnCheckedID, 起始节点 as StartNodeName, 起始节点类型 as StartNodeType, 终止节点 as EndNodeName, 终止节点类型 as EndNodeType, 关系 as Relation from 待审核关系
mapper.insert: insert into 待审核关系(待审核ID, 起始节点, 起始节点类型, 终止节点, 终止节点类型, 关系) values (#{UnCheckedId}, #{StartNodeName}, #{StartNodeType}, #{EndNodeName}, #{EndNodeType}, #{Relation})
mapper.select: select 节点ID as nodeId,节点类型 as label, 节点名称 as nodeName from 节点信息 where 节点名称=#{theNodeName}
